dmca.title: Hire Rite or Rong? (2)
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. <attorney>,

I am following up on numerous correspondences and calls to you requesting that your client, [private] transfer the domain name "hirerite.com" to my client, Hire Right, Inc. Have you had discussions with your client regarding this matter?

My client has requested that we initiate legal proceedings relating to the transfer if the action is not taken by your client on or before Friday August 23, 2002.

I appreciate your status on this at your earliest convenience.
